text: Raul Alberto Portal (23 September 1939 - 14 October 2020) was an Argentine journalist, radio and television presenter. He was known for being the original presenter for Unusual Weekly during the 1980s. He was also the presenter of many reality shows for El Nueve. Portal died of pneumonia caused by multiple strokes on 14 October 2020 in Buenos Aires, aged 81.Murió Raúl Portal: tenía 81 años ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Argentine journalists Category:Argentine entertainers Category:Television personalities Category:Radio personalities Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Deaths from pneumonia
title: Raúl Portal
